{"id":328641519,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â year, 8Â months","timestamp":1587576589,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/328641519/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reformat The String","memory":"7.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string reformat(string s) {\n        int x=0,y=0;\n        string a,b;\n        for(char c : s){\n            if( c>='0' && c<='9'){\n                x +=1;\n                a += c;\n            }else{\n                y +=1;\n                b += c;\n            }\n        }\n        if(abs(x-y)>1){\n            return \"\";\n        }\n        string ans = \"\";\n        if(x < y) swap(x,y),swap(a,b);\n        for(int i= 0;i<y;i++){\n            ans += a[i];\n            ans += b[i];\n        }\n        if(x != y) ans += a[a.size()-1];\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reformat-the-string"}
